page.title: 14COMPUTERS IN THE COUNTRYSIDE
page.content: There are very few industries in this area other than actual farming,but it is surprising to find that one of them is connected to the computer business. Dunglinson's is a firm which supplies and maintains business computer systems to local farms and small industries.They also deal in t.v and video and started out as agricultural engineers and suppliers. They have 14 people working for them full time and use two delivery vehicles.Mr.Dunglinson told us that more and more farmers are using computers to help them with their businesses and also to keep records of milk yields and feeding ststistics. It was surprising to find micro-computers and engineers right in the middle of the countryside,alongside a dairy farm and a long way from the town.
